script:
import sys
from awsglue.transforms import *
from awsglue.utils import getResolvedOptions
from pyspark.context import SparkContext
from awsglue.context import GlueContext
from awsglue.job import Job
import pyspark.sql.functions as F

args = getResolvedOptions(sys.argv, ['JOB_NAME'])
sc = SparkContext()
glueContext = GlueContext(sc)
spark = glueContext.spark_session
job = Job(glueContext)
job.init(args['JOB_NAME'], args)

# Script generated for node Amazon S3
AmazonS3_node1718374298170 = glueContext.create_dynamic_frame.from_options(
    format_options={
        "quoteChar": "\"", 
        "withHeader": True, 
        "separator": ",", 
        "optimizePerformance": False
    }, 
    connection_type="s3", 
    format="csv", 
    connection_options={
        "paths": ["s3://grp6-pfe-data-engineering/input-data/csv/states_name.csv"], 
        "recurse": True
    }, 
    transformation_ctx="AmazonS3_node1718374298170"
)

# Script generated for node Change Schema
ChangeSchema_node1718374312043 = ApplyMapping.apply(
    frame=AmazonS3_node1718374298170, 
    mappings=[
        ("geolocation_state", "string", "geolocation_state", "string"), 
        ("state_name", "string", "state_name", "string")
    ], 
    transformation_ctx="ChangeSchema_node1718374312043"
)

# Convert dynamic frame to DataFrame
df = ChangeSchema_node1718374312043.toDF()

# JDBC connection options
jdbc_url = "jdbc:mysql://database-grp6.chcmvnn5gnpv.us-east-1.rds.amazonaws.com:3306/raw_data"  # Remplacez par votre URL RDS
jdbc_properties = {
    "user": "admin",  # Remplacez par votre nom d'utilisateur
    "password": "salahclement",  # Remplacez par votre mot de passe
    "driver": "com.mysql.jdbc.Driver"
}

# Write the DataFrame to RDS in overwrite mode
df.write.jdbc(
    url=jdbc_url, 
    table="states_name", 
    mode="overwrite", 
    properties=jdbc_properties
)

job.commit()
